snippet: The bickering that has plagued the development of a uniform patent system in Europe foreshadows the problems that another crucial effort, the creation of a banking union, could face.
abstract: The bickering that has plagued the development of a uniform patent system in Europe foreshadows the problems that another crucial effort, the creation of a banking union, could face.
lead_paragraph: The bickering that has plagued the development of a uniform patent system in Europe foreshadows the problems that another crucial effort, the creation of a banking union, could face, reports James Kanter of The New York Times. Read more »

headline.main: Europe Reaches Agreement on System for Patents
